data.description:
This past year has been a tumultuous year full of injustices and disappointments, alongside victories and inspiring solidarity. If we have learned one thing, it is that our voices can positively effect change. We have vowed to be SILENT NO MORE. Join us on Saturday, March 10th, from 9am-5pm at the Historic Academy of Medicine at Georgia Tech for a day of workshops and speakers that are sure to show you just how valuable your voice is. We hope that you will learn how to raise your voice to transform your workplace, community, and the world. See you on March 10! #SilentNoMore
------------------------------------------------
Registration Info: 
Early Bird Registration: February 1 - 8 
Regular Registration: February 9 - 23
Link: goo.gl/frSUde
data.name: Georgia Tech Women's Leadership Conference 2018

place.name: The Historic Academy of Medicine at Georgia Tech

data.description:
Increase Your Impact, Propel Your Career
Approved by PMI to issue PDUs to maintain PMP® Certification

The Georgia Tech Alumni Association has partnered with the Scheller College of Business to offer a customized Executive Leadership Program (ELP) for Georgia Tech Alumni and friends. This four-day intensive program will help professionals develop new skills and perspectives to succeed in their organizations. The ELP will challenge them to think more strategically and effectively manage the critical factors that affect their company’s growth and their careers.
data.name: Georgia Tech Executive Leadership Program

data.description: Zoom: into yourself reflectively, or out, to see the a bird's eye view of your life and the world. How do ideas change the closer, or farther, we look at them? Our 2018 Conference speakers will be exploring these ideas through their own lenses on April 7th, and you don't want to miss it! If an Atlanta professional jumped to your mind who has an interesting perspective or story to share, nominate them to speak at tedxgeorgiatech.com. RSVP and stay tuned for updates!
data.name: TEDxGeorgiaTech 2018 Conference

place.name: The Historic Academy of Medicine at Georgia Tech

data.description: Due to unplayable weather conditions for the outdoor ice rink, tonight's UGA Ice Dawgs vs Georgia Tech hockey game has been cancelled. A rescheduled UGA Ice Dawgs game will be announced this week. We apologize for any inconvenience and look forward to hosting you again soon.

data.name: Syracuse vs. Georgia Tech

data.description:
Facebook is hosting a Product Design Tech Talk on Georgia Tech campus and we would love for you to attend! Our speaker is Abhishek Nandakumar, who graduated from Georgia Tech MS-HCI '14 and is a Product Designer building Facebook's Marketplace and Payment Products.

Abhishek will be talking about a day-in-the-life as a Product Designer at Facebook, give insight on design projects across different product organizations and tell us about his journey post-graduation. Please join us!
 
Location: Auditorium in East Architecture Building 1F
Date: Thursday Feb 8th at 6 PM

Make sure to RSVP at fbatgtech.splashthat.com
data.name: Facebook's Product Design Tech Talk at Georgia Tech

place.name: 245 4th St NW, Atlanta, GA 30313, United States

data.description: Interactivity is a yearly showcase of projects by graduate students working with faculty in Georgia Tech's M.S. in Human-Computer Interaction, M.S. in Digital Media, and Master of Industrial Design programs. Come chat with Salesforce Designers and Researchers to learn about what our teams are up to and opportunities for you to join!
data.name: Join Salesforce for the Georgia Tech Interactivity!
